content: NKorea have threatened us already, China messed with an unarmed Navy Vessel, whats next? I don't think Obama has the intestinal fortitude to go to war, or protect our interests. And i know he is our CinC, but come on, the world is walking all over us and he's just sitting on the sidelines. Thoughts?
reply: NKorea have threatened us already, China messed with an unarmed Navy Vessel, whats next? I don't think Obama has the intestinal fortitude to go to war, or protect our interests. And i know he is our CinC, but come on, the world is walking all over us and he's just sitting on the sidelines. Thoughts?
title: Will Obama do anything about other countries threatening us?

title: Will Obama do anything about other countries threatening us?

content: I wouldn't doubt it if he were to put his arm over their shoulders and say "OK boys, this is how we devide it up........" One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

title: Will Obama do anything about other countries threatening us?

content: quote: Originally posted by BamaBoy91291: NKorea have threatened us already, China messed with an unarmed Navy Vessel, whats next? I don't think Obama has the intestinal fortitude to go to war, or protect our interests. And i know he is our CinC, but come on, the world is walking all over us and he's just sitting on the sidelines. Thoughts? All of the above happened under President Bush, as well, and President Clinton. And neither got involved militarily. None of these men is stupid. Total war with North Korea would result in North Korea wiping out rather a large number of South Korean civilians who are well within range of traditional artillery and God knows what else. China could stop trading with us and pull out of all our treasury bonds - this would literally wipe out our entire economy within hours. It would make the current recession look a cakewalk by comparison. Neither of those wars would be worth fighting until our citizens were actually targeted, maybe not even until after they were killed. The cost is too high. That's why neither Clinton nor Bush reacted overly much to North Korea's talk, nor even to China detaining the entire crew of an EP3 military plane when they force landed in its territory. Obama will make the right call if any country (or international terrorist group) poses a serious threat to our country, rather than just being obnoxious.

I don't think Obama has the intestinal fortitude to go to war, or protect our interests. reply: All of the above happened under President Bush, as well, and President Clinton. And neither got involved militarily. None of these men is stupid. Total war with North Korea would result in North Korea wiping out rather a large number of South Korean civilians who are well within range of traditional artillery and God knows what else. China could stop trading with us and pull out of all our treasury bonds - this would literally wipe out our entire economy within hours. It would make the current recession look a cakewalk by comparison. Neither of those wars would be worth fighting until our citizens were actually targeted, maybe not even until after they were killed. The cost is too high. That's why neither Clinton nor Bush reacted overly much to North Korea's talk, nor even to China detaining the entire crew of an EP3 military plane when they force landed in its territory. Obama will make the right call if any country (or international terrorist group) poses a serious threat to our country, rather than just being obnoxious.

content: A US Navy 'research' vessel 115 Km off the Chinese island of Hainan and inside what the Chinese call an 'economic exclusion zone' gets 'harassed' by unprofessional Chinese civilians and a fishery patrol vessel. Had the Chinese been serious they would have forced it into port, and returned the pieces next month.
